item.description:
Hello everybody,

I am hosting the Cash Flow Game at my place in Boston Sunday October 28th at 7:00 pm.

Below are the details

Place: Charles River Park Complex. 8 Whittier Place. "If you lived here you'd be home now" complex
When: Sunday October 28th, 2007 7:00pm
Cost: $8 per person. The fee will provide you with catered refreshments and sandwiches from Whole Foods.
Parking: There is parking at the complex for a reduced fee. Please bring your tickets with you so I can stamp it.
Subway: Green Line "E" train is directly across the complex. Highly recommended

Please RSVP by October 21st. Space limited to 15 people.

Thank you
Edan
item.name: Cash Flow Game
